title: Iran’s Nuclear Scientist: How Will the Killing of Mohsen Fakhrizadeh Affect Tehran’s Nuclear Program?
sub_head: The killing was a strike against Iran’s nuclear capabilities and risks fueling hostilities in the Middle East
body:
A top Iranian nuclear scientist was killed in an attack in a town near Tehran on Nov. 27, the latest blow to Iran’s nuclear ambitions.
The killing of Mohsen Fakhrizadeh risks fueling hostilities in the Middle East when Iran needs to restore diplomacy with the U.S. to gain sanctions relief and salvage its economy, but is also looking for ways to deter its enemies.
His...
